WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
SARDINIA.
DNC 08.
M/V REJUCILO DISABLED AND ADRIFT IN 40-33.48N 006-45.04E
AT 041030Z SEP. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC LA GARDE,
